name: roles
description:
List [roles](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001078646-Role-Based-Access-Control) on your account **Scopes:** `role:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`
**Prerequisites** : * Pro or higher plan. * For setting the initial role, you must be the Account Owner. * For subsequent role management, you must be the Account Owner or user with role management permissions.

$ul: **total_records**: The number of all records available across pages
